Welcome, Contestant

Retrieve Relic

Signal for
Extraction

Escape
the Island

The goal of SOS is simple: find a relic, signal for extraction, and escape on the helicopter. With sixteen Contestants and only three seats on the helicopter, you'll need to out-think, out-run, and out-fight your opponents.

Use the power of your own voice and personality to create bonds with other Contestants and the audience. Statistics show Contestants that work together have a higher rate of survival than those who don't.

1
Island

16
Contestants

30
Minutes

3
Survivors

Live Premiere

The SOS Alpha Live Premiere took place June 24th and 25th. 16 determined contestants entertained us in their fight for fame and fortune. In the end, two topped the leaderboards.
